title: Lisa Snowdon parades her jaw-dropping physique in a striped bikini on a wellness break in Thailand
text:
She's been enjoyed the relaxing break at a wellness centre in Thailand.

And Lisa Snowdon was once again displaying her jaw-dropping physique on Wednesday as she took to Instagram to share another sizzling post from the Kamalaya wellness sanctuary and holistic spa resort in Koh Samui.

The presenter, 47, looked incredible in the pastel striped two-piece as she praised her fiancé George Smart for supporting her decision to embark on the solo break, and gushed that she was 'lucky' to be marrying him.

Gorgeous: Lisa Snowdon, 47, displayed her jaw-dropping physique in a pastel striped bikini on Wednesday as she shared another snap from her wellness break to Thailand

In the snap, Lisa displayed her amazing figure in the colourful striped bikini as she posed amongst the beautiful Thai jungle.

The This Morning regular shared the candid post as she lamented the end of her Thai break, and praised fiancé George for always being there for her.

She wrote: 'In the jungle. This trip I’ve had the privilege of meeting and working alongside some the best healers, life enhancement mentors, coaches, caring loving kind people here at @kamalayakohsamui. Everyone here has the most unique energy- pure selflessness, wise, funny, calm, and loving beyond....

'Yes, I’m a little sad to be leaving everyone behind, but I’m equally excited at seeing all my loved ones, who I have missed...

Sweet: The presenter shared a lengthy post alongside her bikini snap, as she lamented the end of her relaxing break

Sweet: Lisa also praised her fiancé George Smart for supporting her decision to embark on the solo break, and gushed she is 'lucky' to be marrying him (pictured earlier this month)

She continued: 'My fiancé George is an incredibly loving, patient and understanding partner who encourages me to travel, to see my friends and to take time for myself, he gives me the freedom to be able to explore and learn and to heal.

'I’m a very lucky girl... It’s important to take time for you even when you are in a relationship. We all need us time too and he gets that.

'It ultimately will make us stronger as a partnership the more we give each other the freedom to grow and explore what makes us happy...'

Stunning: It comes as Lisa continues to share updates from her relaxing trip to the Kamalaya wellness sanctuary and holistic spa resort in Koh Samui, Thailand

Lisa has been regularly updating fans with snaps from her Thai getaway, and took to social media on Tuesday to share even more sizzling snaps.

Giggling to the camera, Lisa looked incredible as she showcased her sensational curves in a pink and red striped bikini.

She captioned the snap: 'The monsoon might be hold for today❤️❤️❤️ New bikini @Casa raki ❤️❤️❤️ @kamalayakohsamui.'

While Lisa went on to wear the bikini on her Instagram stories where she shared another picture of herself posing in the swimwear as she reached in the air, showcasing her toned abs.

It comes after the ITV star share some stunning swimwear snaps to her Instagram on Monday, in one image posted on her grid, the star donned a strapless, pale green bikini as she gazed up to the camera.

Wow: The model took to Instagram on Tuesday to share some sizzling swimwear snaps of herself during her getaway

The skimpy number allowed her to display her flawless figure to perfection, with Lisa adding a green animal print cover-up to her look.

The former Strictly Come Dancing contestant's saturated brunette tresses hung loosely, while she let her natural beauty shine through by going make-up free.

Another image showed the star larking around on a beach, this time donning a multicoloured stripes two-piece in pastel hues.

Chilled: It comes after the ITV star share some stunning swimwear snaps to her Instagram on Monday, in one image posted on her grid, the star donned a strapless, pale green bikini

Bikini babe: Another image showed the star larking around on a beach, this time donning a multicoloured striped two-piece in pastel hues

Arching her arm above her head, Lisa grinned to the camera as she posed amid the idyllic beach setting.

Earlier in the week, Lisa explained that she headed to Thailand so she could press the 'pause button' and take some time away from her hectic life.

She wrote on Instagram: 'My smile says it all... Taking some time away for me. Meditation, contemplation and healing. Just pressing the pause button on life to be able to make some space in my mind and my body, get rid of unwanted emotions, and physical pain...

'Eating an abundance of delicious plant based food, with some fresh fish as well... My phone is usually attached to me, this trip I’m only allowing 20mins max a day, so if you’ve sent me a text, email or DM, I’m not ignoring you.... or maybe I am! it’s so good to be back.'

Take a break: Earlier in the week, Lisa explained that she headed to Thailand so she could press the 'pause button' and take some time away from her hectic life

In addition to her bikini snaps, Lisa had been keeping her fans updated with her time at the spa, with the TV personality sharing several images nature and her stunning resort.

She also watched a morning Hindu prayer, had an infrared sauna and took part in a yoga class.

Lisa's getaway appeared to be without her fiancé George Smart, 40.

Lisa recently said she didn't have any intention of having children because she doesn't want to add any pressure to a relationship that is 'perfect the way it is'.

Speaking to The Sun on Sunday's Fabulous magazine, the model said: 'I value our relationship so much that I don't want anything to change and I don't want to put that added pressure on him or me, because it would.

Activities: She also watched a morning Hindu prayer, had an infrared sauna and took part in a yoga class

'I could do it a different way, but I don't want to. I'm very much a believer in fate and I think that George and I are very lucky to have each other.

'We're just really happy with out lot, which is so hard for people to understand. It's so hard because everyone's always like: ''You can adopt'. I'm like, 'Really? I had no idea.''

The model and presenter first dated George 18 years ago when they both worked for MTV, but it wasn't until the pair were reintroduced to each other through a mutual friend four years ago that their relationship was rekindled.

In January 2017, the couple announced they were engaged after George proposed to Lisa just five weeks after she left the 2016 series of I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out of Here.
description: The presenter, 47, looked incredible in the pastel striped two-piece as she praised her fiancé George Smart for supporting her decision to embark on the solo break in a candid Instagram post.
